description: Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode using the "/s" flag where the script is located in a potentially suspicious location.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False positives may occur if you execute the script from one of the paths mentioned in the rule. Apply additional filters that fits your org needs.
name: Diskshadow Script Mode - Execution From Potential Suspicious Location
query: (event.category:process AND ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Dd][Ii][Ss][Kk][Ss][Hh][Aa][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Kk][Ss][Hh][Aa][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Ss]\ .*/ OR /.*\-[Ss]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/))
